gr::Shader::Begin Class Reference

#include <Shader.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Begins rendering using the shader.

Calls Shader::begin() in the constructor and Shader::end() in the destructor. Use this class instead of the methods directly for exception-safety.

See also:
Shader::begin


Public Member Functions

 Begin (Shader *shader)
 Begins rendering using the shader.
int passes () const
 Returns number of passes needed by the shader.
 ~Begin ()
 Ends rendering using the shader.
